# f5distributedcloud_k8s_cluster_role (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_k8s_cluster_role` resource manages Kubernetes Cluster Roles in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Kubernetes Cluster Roles define cluster-wide permissions for RBAC.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_k8s_cluster_role" "example" {
  name        = "my-cluster-role"
  namespace   = "system"
  description = "Cluster role for admin access"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
